scripts.start:db: dotenv -- docker run -d --rm --name my-postgres-db -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_DB=$DB_NAME -e POSTGRES_USER=$DB_USER -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD postgres:latest
scripts.dev:app: npm run dev --workspace=client & npm run dev --workspace=server
scripts.dev: npm run start:db && npm run dev:app
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=server
